title: Pixel 2 XL Suddenly Stuck at Boot
content:
Pixel 2XL Device is currently stuck at the boot, where the Google logo appears and there is a small bar that keeps on loading and doesn't end.

I tried going to the bootloader and already did below :
* Restart the bootloader 
* Reboot the device 

I don't want to do a factory reset as I need my data.

Any leads to recover the data and maybe fix the phone would be appreciated :) 
Thank you so much.
